availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James William Wallis (Estill County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas M. Wallis. Resident of Fayette County in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1863. Served in the Kentucky Home Guard as a captain in 1862.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0002-225-0020.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette, District 2, p. 243A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Estill County, KY, August 1863, p. 182, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "James William Wallis (Birth-Death)," Memorial #28149202, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28149202 (accessed November 3, 2019).
